title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Key Terror Financing Hub in Gaza: Alkahraba Structure Targeted”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a structure from which the company “Alkahraba” operated, serving military strengthening of terrorist organizations in the Gaza Strip; a terrorist who acted, among other roles, as a financier for the military strengthening of the terrorist organizations has been eliminated.

Last night (Friday), an Israel Air Force fighter jet attacked, guided by intelligence from Military Intelligence (AMAN) and the Israel Security Agency (Shin Bet), a structure that served for military strengthening of terrorist organizations in the Gaza Strip.

The structure housed the company “Alkahraba,” which has been a central infrastructure for storing and transferring funds for terrorist organizations in the Gaza Strip and executing terrorist operations since the onset of hostilities.

The structure was located in a humanitarian area in the Deir al-Balah space and served as a foundation for terrorist activities. The attack on the structure was carried out after the evacuation of the population in the area and using precise munitions to minimize harm to civilians.

Terrorist organizations regularly violate international law, systematically exploiting civilian structures and the civilian population as human shields for terrorist operations against the State of Israel.

Additionally, two days ago (Thursday), an attack was carried out in which the IDF eliminated the terrorist Tahseen Al-Alandis, who was involved, among other things, with the company “Alkahraba.” Tahseen was transferring funds to terrorist organizations in the Gaza Strip, including to the military wing of Hamas.
